VColorInput/validate-on.description: Change what type of event triggers validation to run.

VColorInput/validation-value.description: The value used when applying validation rules.

VColorInput/focused.description: Forces a focused state styling on the component.

VColorInput/hide-details.description: Hides hint and validation errors. When set to `auto` messages will be rendered only if there's a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display.

VColorInput/counter.description: Creates counter for input length; if no number is specified, it defaults to 25. Does not apply any validation.

VColorInput/hide-actions.description: Prevent showing the default actions buttons. Does not affect `<component :is="actions" />`

VColorInput/persistent-placeholder.description: Forces placeholder to always be visible.

VColorInput/persistent-counter.description: Forces counter to always be visible.

VColorInput/append-inner-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **append-inner** slot.

VColorInput/clearable.description: Allows for the component to be cleared.

VColorInput/clear-icon.description: The icon used when the **clearable** prop is set to true.

VColorInput/dirty.description: Manually apply the dirty state styling.

VColorInput/persistent-clear.description: Always show the clearable icon when the input is dirty (By default it only shows on hover).

VColorInput/prepend-inner-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend-inner** slot.

VColorInput/single-line.description: Label does not move on focus/dirty.

VColorInput/counter-value.description: Function returns the counter display text.

VColorInput/dot-size.description: Changes the size of the selection dot on the canvas.

VColorInput/swatches-max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of the swatches section.

VColorInput/landscape.description: Puts the picker into landscape mode.

VColorInput/swatches.description: Sets the available color swatches to select from. 2D array of rows and columns, accepts any color format the picker does.

VColorPicker/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VColorPicker/mode.description: The current selected input type. Syncable with `v-model:mode`.

VColorPicker/title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

VColorPicker/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VColorPicker/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VColorPicker/width.description: Sets the width of the color picker.

VColorPicker/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VColorPicker/border.description: Applies utility border classes to the component. To use it, you need to omit the `border-` prefix, (for example use `border-sm` as `border="sm"`).  Find a list of the built-in border classes on the [borders page](/styles/borders).

VColorPicker/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

VColorPicker/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VColorPicker/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

VColorPicker/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VColorPicker/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

VColorPicker/location.description: Specifies the component's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.

VColorPicker/position.description: Sets the position for the component.

VColorPicker/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. This can be **0**, **xs**, **sm**, true, **lg**, **xl**, **pill**, **circle**, and **shaped**. Find more information on available border radius classes on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

VColorPicker/tile.description: Removes any applied **border-radius** from the component.

VColorPicker/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VColorPicker/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VColorPicker/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VColorPicker/dot-size.description: Changes the size of the selection dot on the canvas.

VColorPicker/swatches-max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of the swatches section.

VColorPicker/divided.description: Adds a divider between the header and controls.

VColorPicker/landscape.description: Puts the picker into landscape mode.

VColorPicker/swatches.description: Sets the available color swatches to select from. 2D array of rows and columns, accepts any color format the picker does.

VCombobox/flat.description: Removes box shadow when using a variant with elevation.

VCombobox/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VCombobox/error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.

VCombobox/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

VCombobox/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VCombobox/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VCombobox/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VCombobox/rounded.description: Adds a border radius to the input.

VCombobox/tile.description: Removes any applied **border-radius** from the component.

VCombobox/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VCombobox/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VCombobox/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

VCombobox/delimiters.description: Accepts an array of strings that will trigger a new tag when typing. Does not replace the normal Tab and Enter keys.

VCombobox/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the input.

VCombobox/multiple.description: Changes select to multiple. Accepts array for value.

VCombobox/id.description: Sets the DOM id on the component.

VCombobox/role.description: The role attribute applied to the input.

VCombobox/label.description: Sets the text of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.

VCombobox/transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

VCombobox/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VCombobox/menu.description: Renders with the menu open by default.

VCombobox/base-color.description: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.

VCombobox/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

VCombobox/eager.description: Forces the component's content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.

VCombobox/items.description: Can be an array of objects or strings. By default objects should have **title** and **value** properties, and can optionally have a **props** property containing any [VListItem props](/api/v-list-item/#props). Keys to use for these can be changed with the **item-title**, **item-value**, and **item-props** props.

VCombobox/prepend-icon.description: Prepends an icon to the outside the component's input, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`.

VCombobox/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

VCombobox/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

VCombobox/direction.description: Changes the direction of the input.

VCombobox/center-affix.description: Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center.

VCombobox/glow.description: Makes prepend/append icons full opacity when the field is focused and apply color.

VCombobox/icon-color.description: Sets the color of the prepend/append icons.

VCombobox/hide-spin-buttons.description: Hides spin buttons on the input when type is set to `number`.

VCombobox/hint.description: Displays hint text below the input when focused. Force this always open with the [persistent-hint](#props-persistent-hint) property.

VCombobox/messages.description: Displays a list of messages or a single message if using a string.

VCombobox/error-messages.description: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation.

VCombobox/max-errors.description: Control the maximum number of shown errors from validation.

VCombobox/rules.description: Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`.

VCombobox/validate-on.type:
| 'eager'
  | 'lazy'
  | 'blur'
  | 'input'
  | 'submit'
  | 'invalid-input'
  | 'blur lazy'
  | 'input lazy'
  | 'submit lazy'
  | 'invalid-input lazy'
  | 'blur eager'
  | 'input eager'
  | 'submit eager'
  | 'invalid-input eager'
  | 'lazy blur'
  | 'lazy input'
  | 'lazy submit'
  | 'lazy invalid-input'
  | 'eager blur'
  | 'eager input'
  | 'eager submit'
  | 'eager invalid-input'
VCombobox/validate-on.description: Change what type of event triggers validation to run.

VCombobox/focused.description: Forces a focused state styling on the component.

VCombobox/hide-details.description: Hides hint and validation errors. When set to `auto` messages will be rendered only if there's a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display.

VCombobox/value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare **model-value** and values contains in the **items** prop.

VCombobox/counter.description: Creates counter for input length; if no number is specified, it defaults to 25. Does not apply any validation.

VCombobox/persistent-placeholder.description: Forces placeholder to always be visible.

VCombobox/persistent-counter.description: Forces counter to always be visible.

VCombobox/clearable.description: Allows for the component to be cleared.

VCombobox/clear-icon.description: The icon used when the **clearable** prop is set to true.

VCombobox/persistent-clear.description: Always show the clearable icon when the input is dirty (By default it only shows on hover).

VCombobox/prepend-inner-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend-inner** slot.

VCombobox/single-line.description: Label does not move on focus/dirty.

VCombobox/counter-value.description: Function returns the counter display text.

VCombobox/auto-select-first.description: When searching, will always highlight the first option and select it on blur. `exact` will only highlight and select exact matches.

VCombobox/clear-on-select.description: Reset the search text when a selection is made while using the **multiple** prop.

VCombobox/filter-mode.description:
Controls how the results of `customFilter` and `customKeyFilter` are combined. All modes only apply `customFilter` to columns not specified in `customKeyFilter`.

- **some**: There is at least one match from either the custom filter or the custom key filter.
- **every**: All columns match either the custom filter or the custom key filter.
- **union**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, or all columns match the custom key filters.
- **intersection**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, and all columns match the custom key filters.

VCombobox/custom-filter.description: Function used to filter items, called for each filterable key on each item in the list. The first argument is the filterable value from the item, the second is the search term, and the third is the internal item object. The function should return true if the item should be included in the filtered list, or the index of the match in the value if it should be included with the result highlighted.

VCombobox/custom-key-filter.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. `customFilter` is skipped for columns with `customKeyFilter` specified.

VCombobox/filter-keys.description: Array of specific keys to filter on the item.

VCombobox/chips.description: Changes display of selections to chips.

VCombobox/closable-chips.description: Enables the [closable](/api/v-chip/#props-closable) prop on all [v-chip](/components/chips/) components.

VCombobox/close-text.description: Text set to the inputs `aria-label` and `title` when input menu is closed.

VCombobox/open-text.description: Text set to the inputs **aria-label** and **title** when input menu is open.

VCombobox/hide-no-data.description: Hides the menu when there are no options to show.  Useful for preventing the menu from opening before results are fetched asynchronously.  Also has the effect of opening the menu when the `items` array changes if not already open.

VCombobox/hide-selected.description: Do not display in the select menu items that are already selected.

VCombobox/list-props.description: Pass props through to the `v-list` component. Accepts an object with anything from [v-list](/api/v-list/#props) props, camelCase keys are recommended.

VCombobox/item-title.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its title.

VCombobox/item-value.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its value.

VCombobox/item-props.description: Props object that will be applied to each item component. `true` will treat the original object as raw props and pass it directly to the component.

VCombobox/return-object.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with **item-value**.

VCombobox/menu-props.description: Pass props through to the `v-menu` component. Accepts an object with anything from [v-menu](/api/v-menu/#props) props, camelCase keys are recommended.

VCombobox/no-data-text.description: Text shown when no items are provided to the component.

VCombobox/open-on-clear.description: Open's the menu whenever the clear icon is clicked.

VComponentIcon/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VComponentIcon/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component.

VConfirmEdit/disabled.description: Control the disabled state of action buttons. If not provided, internal logic will be used to determine the disabled state.

VConfirmEdit/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VConfirmEdit/hide-actions.description: Prevent showing the default actions buttons. Does not affect `<component :is="actions" />`

VContainer/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VContainer/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VContainer/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VContainer/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

VContainer/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VContainer/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

VContainer/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VCounter/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VCounter/active.description: Determines whether the counter is visible or not.

VCounter/transition.type:
| string
  | boolean
  | (TransitionProps & { component: Component })
  | { component: Component }
VCounter/transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

VDataIterator/search.description: Text input used to filter items.

VDataIterator/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VDataIterator/items.description: An array of strings or objects used for automatically generating children components.

VDataIterator/loading.description: If `true` and no items are provided, then a loading text will be shown.

VDataIterator/filter-mode.description:
Controls how the results of `customFilter` and `customKeyFilter` are combined. All modes only apply `customFilter` to columns not specified in `customKeyFilter`.

- **some**: There is at least one match from either the custom filter or the custom key filter.
- **every**: All columns match either the custom filter or the custom key filter.
- **union**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, or all columns match the custom key filters.
- **intersection**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, and all columns match the custom key filters.

VDataIterator/custom-key-filter.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. `customFilter` is skipped for columns with `customKeyFilter` specified.

VDataIterator/filter-keys.description: Array of specific keys to filter on the item.

VDataIterator/select-strategy.description: Defines the strategy of selecting items in the list. Possible values are: 'single' (only one item can be selected at a time), 'page' ('Select all' button will select only items on the current page), 'all' ('Select all' button will select all items in the list).

VDataIterator/item-value.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its value.

VDataIterator/return-object.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with **item-value**.

VDataIterator/value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare **model-value** and values contains in the **items** prop.

VDataIterator/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VDataIterator/transition.type:
| string
  | boolean
  | (TransitionProps & { component: Component })
  | { component: Component; hideOnLeave: boolean }
VDataIterator/transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

VDataIterator/item-selectable.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains the boolean value indicating if the item is selectable.

VDataIterator/show-select.description: Shows the column with checkboxes for selecting items in the list.

VDataIterator/sort-by.description: Changes which item property (or properties) should be used for sort order. Can be used with `.sync` modifier.

VDataIterator/multi-sort.description: If `true` then one can sort on multiple properties.

VDataIterator/must-sort.description: If `true` then one can not disable sorting, it will always switch between ascending and descending.

VDataIterator/custom-key-sort.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. `customSort` is skipped for columns with `customKeySort` specified.

VDataIterator/items-per-page.description: Changes how many items per page should be visible. Can be used with `.sync` modifier. Setting this prop to `-1` will display all items on the page.

VDataIterator/expand-on-click.description: Expands item when the row is clicked.

VDataIterator/expanded.description: Array of expanded items. Can be used with `.sync` modifier.

VDataIterator/group-by.description: Changes which item property should be used for grouping items. Currently only supports a single grouping in the format: `group` or `['group']`. When using an array, only the first element is considered. Can be used with `.sync` modifier.

VDataTable/search.description: Text input used to filter items.

VDataTable/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VDataTable/height.description: Set an explicit height of table.

VDataTable/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VDataTable/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

- **intersection**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, and all columns match the custom key filters.

Possible values are: 'single' (only one item can be selected at a time), 'page' ('Select all' button will select only items on the current page), 'all' ('Select all' button will select all items in the list).

VDataTable/return-object.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with **item-value**.

VDataTable/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VDataTable/no-data-text.description: Text shown when no items are provided to the component.

VDataTable/item-selectable.description: Property on supplied `items` that indicates whether the item is selectable.

VDataTable/show-select.description: Shows the select checkboxes in both the header and rows (if using default rows).

VDataTable/sort-by.description: Changes which item property (or properties) should be used for sort order. Can be used with `.sync` modifier.

VDataTable/multi-sort.description: If `true` then one can sort on multiple properties.

VDataTable/must-sort.description: If `true` then one can not disable sorting, it will always switch between ascending and descending.

VDataTable/custom-key-sort.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. `customSort` is skipped for columns with `customKeySort` specified.

VDataTable/items-per-page.description: Changes how many items per page should be visible. Can be used with `.sync` modifier. Setting this prop to `-1` will display all items on the page.

VDataTable/expand-on-click.description: Expands item when the row is clicked.

VDataTable/show-expand.description: Shows the expand toggle in default rows.

VDataTable/expanded.description: Whether the item is expanded or not.

VDataTable/group-by.description: Changes which item property should be used for grouping items. Currently only supports a single grouping in the format: `group` or `['group']`. When using an array, only the first element is considered. Can be used with `.sync` modifier.

VDataTable/header-props.description: Pass props to the default header. See [`v-data-table-headers` API](/api/v-data-table-headers) for more information.

VDataTable/cell-props.type:
| Record<string, any>
  | ((
      data: Pick<
        ItemKeySlot<any>,
        'value' | 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem' | 'column'
      >,
    ) => Record<string, any>)
VDataTable/cell-props.description: An object of additional props to be passed to each `<td>` in the table body. Also accepts a function that will be called for each cell. If the same prop is defined both here and in `cellProps` in a headers object, the value from the headers object will be used.

VDataTable/headers.type:
{
  readonly key?:
    | (string & {})
    | 'data-table-group'
    | 'data-table-select'
    | 'data-table-expand'
    | undefined
  readonly value?: SelectItemKey<any>
  readonly title?: string | undefined
  readonly fixed?: boolean | undefined
  readonly align?: 'start' | 'end' | 'center' | undefined
  readonly width?: string | number | undefined
  readonly minWidth?: string | number | undefined
  readonly maxWidth?: string | number | undefined
  readonly nowrap?: boolean | undefined
  readonly headerProps?: { readonly [x: string]: any } | undefined
  readonly cellProps?:
    | { readonly [x: string]: any }
    | HeaderCellPropsFunction
    | undefined
  readonly sortable?: boolean | undefined
  readonly sort?: DataTableCompareFunction<any> | undefined
  readonly sortRaw?: DataTableCompareFunction<any> | undefined
  readonly filter?: FilterFunction | undefined
  readonly children?: readonly any[] | undefined
}[]
VDataTable/headers.description: An array of objects that each describe a header column.

VDataTable/loading-text.description: Text shown when the data is loading.

VDataTable/mobile-breakpoint.description: Overrides the display configuration default screen size that the component should be considered in mobile.

VDataTable/row-props.type:
| Record<string, any>
  | ((
      data: Pick<ItemKeySlot<any>, 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem'>,
    ) => Record<string, any>)
VDataTable/row-props.description: An object of additional props to be passed to each `<tr>` in the table body. Also accepts a function that will be called for each row.

VDataTable/fixed-header.description: Fixed header to top of table.

VDataTable/sort-asc-icon.description: Icon used for ascending sort button.

VDataTable/sort-desc-icon.description: Icon used for descending sort button.

VDataTable/fixed-footer.description: Use the fixed-footer prop together with the height prop to fix the footer to the bottom of the table.

VDataTable/hover.description: Adds a hover effects to a table rows.

VDataTable/items-per-page-options.description: Array of options to show in the items-per-page dropdown.

VDataTable/show-current-page.description: Show current page number between prev/next icons.

VDataTableFooter/items-per-page-options.description: Array of options to show in the items-per-page dropdown.

VDataTableFooter/show-current-page.description: Show current page number between prev/next icons.

VDataTableHeaders/multi-sort.description: Sort on multiple columns at the same time.

VDataTableHeaders/header-props.description: Additional props to be be passed to the default header

VDataTableHeaders/mobile-breakpoint.description: Overrides the display configuration default screen size that the component should be considered in mobile.

VDataTableHeaders/fixed-header.description: Sticks the header to the top of the table.

VDataTableHeaders/sort-asc-icon.description: Icon used for ascending sort button.

VDataTableHeaders/sort-desc-icon.description: Icon used for descending sort button.

VDataTableRow/item.description: Data (key, index and column values) of the displayed item.

VDataTableRow/cell-props.description: Props to be applied to the cell.

VDataTableRow/mobile-breakpoint.description: Overrides the display configuration default screen size that the component should be considered in mobile.

VDataTableRows/items.description: An array of strings or objects used for automatically generating children components.

VDataTableVirtual/filter-mode.description:
Controls how the results of `customFilter` and `customKeyFilter` are combined. All modes only apply `customFilter` to columns not specified in `customKeyFilter`.

- **some**: There is at least one match from either the custom filter or the custom key filter.
- **every**: All columns match either the custom filter or the custom key filter.
- **union**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, or all columns match the custom key filters.
- **intersection**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, and all columns match the custom key filters.

VDataTableVirtual/custom-filter.description: Function used to filter items, called for each filterable key on each item in the list. The first argument is the filterable value from the item, the second is the search term, and the third is the internal item object. The function should return true if the item should be included in the filtered list, or the index of the match in the value if it should be included with the result highlighted.

VDataTableVirtual/custom-key-filter.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. `customFilter` is skipped for columns with `customKeyFilter` specified.

VDataTableVirtual/filter-keys.description: Array of specific keys to filter on the item.

VDateInput/flat.description: Removes box shadow when using a variant with elevation.

VDateInput/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VDateInput/error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.

VDateInput/header.description: Text shown when no **display-date** is set.

VDateInput/label.description: Sets the text of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.

VDateInput/menu.description: Renders with the menu open by default.

VDateInput/title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

VDateInput/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the input.

VDateInput/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VDateInput/multiple.description: Allow the selection of multiple dates. The **range** value selects all dates between two selections.

VDateInput/id.description: Sets the DOM id on the component.

VDateInput/role.description: The role attribute applied to the input.

VDateInput/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VDateInput/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

VDateInput/base-color.description: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.

VDateInput/prepend-icon.description: Prepends an icon to the outside the component's input, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`.

VDateInput/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

VDateInput/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

VDateInput/border.description: Applies utility border classes to the component. To use it, you need to omit the `border-` prefix, (for example use `border-sm` as `border="sm"`).  Find a list of the built-in border classes on the [borders page](/styles/borders).

VDateInput/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

VDateInput/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

VDateInput/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VDateInput/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

VDateInput/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VDateInput/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

VDateInput/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

VDateInput/location.description: Specifies the date picker's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.

VDateInput/position.description: Sets the position for the component.

VDateInput/rounded.description: Adds a border radius to the input.

VDateInput/tile.description: Removes any applied **border-radius** from the component.

VDateInput/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VDateInput/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

VDateInput/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VDateInput/transition.description: The transition used when changing months into the future

VDateInput/counter.description: Creates counter for input length; if no number is specified, it defaults to 25. Does not apply any validation.

VDateInput/persistent-placeholder.description: Forces placeholder to always be visible.

VDateInput/persistent-counter.description: Forces counter to always be visible.

VDateInput/center-affix.description: Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center.

VDateInput/glow.description: Makes prepend/append icons full opacity when the field is focused and apply color.

VDateInput/icon-color.description: Sets the color of the prepend/append icons.

VDateInput/hide-spin-buttons.description: Hides spin buttons on the input when type is set to `number`.

VDateInput/hint.description: Displays hint text below the input when focused. Force this always open with the [persistent-hint](#props-persistent-hint) property.

VDateInput/messages.description: Displays a list of messages or a single message if using a string.

VDateInput/direction.description: Changes the direction of the input.

VDateInput/error-messages.description: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation.

VDateInput/max-errors.description: Control the maximum number of shown errors from validation.

VDateInput/rules.description: Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`.

VDateInput/input-format.description: Format for manual date input. Use yyyy, mm, dd with separators '.', '-', '/' (e.g. 'yyyy-mm-dd', 'dd/mm/yyyy').

VDateInput/control-height.description: Sets the height of the controls.

VDateInput/show-week.description: Toggles visibility of the week numbers in the body of the calendar.

VDatePickerControls/view-mode.description: Sets the view mode of the date picker.

VDatePickerControls/control-height.description: Sets the height of the controls.

VDatePickerControls/mode-icon.description: Icon used for the mode button.

VDatePickerHeader/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VDatePickerHeader/transition.description: Sets the transition when the header changes.

VDatePickerHeader/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

VDatePickerMonth/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VDatePickerMonth/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VDatePickerMonth/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VDatePickerMonth/max.description: Sets the maximum date of the month.

VDatePickerMonth/min.description: Sets the minimum date of the month.

VDatePickerMonth/multiple.description: Sets the multiple of the month.

VDatePickerMonth/transition.description: The transition used when changing months into the future

VDatePickerMonth/weekdays.description: Sets the weekdays of the month.

VDatePickerMonth/weeks-in-month.description: A dynamic number of weeks in a month will grow and shrink depending on how many days are in the month. A static number always shows 7 weeks.

VDatePickerMonth/first-day-of-week.description: Sets the first day of the week, starting with 0 for Sunday.

VDatePickerMonth/allowed-dates.description: Sets the allowed dates of the month.

VDatePickerMonth/reverse-transition.description: The transition used when changing months into the past

VDatePickerMonth/hide-weekdays.description: Hide the days of the week letters.

VDatePickerMonths/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VDatePickerMonths/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VDatePickerMonths/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VDatePickerMonths/max.description: Sets the maximum selectable date. Months after this date will be disabled.

VDatePickerMonths/min.description: Sets the minimum selectable date. Months before this date will be disabled.

VDatePickerMonths/year.description: Sets the year for the given months.

VDatePickerYears/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VDatePickerYears/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VDatePickerYears/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VDatePickerYears/max.description: Sets the maximum date of the month.

VDatePickerYears/min.description: Sets the minimum date of the month.

VDefaultsProvider/disabled.description: Turns off all calculations of new default values for improved performance in situations where defaults propagation isn't necessary.

VDefaultsProvider/reset.description: Reset the default values up the nested chain by {n} amount.

VDefaultsProvider/root.description: Force current defaults to match the application root defaults.

VDefaultsProvider/scoped.description: Prevents the ability for default values to be inherited from parent components.

VDefaultsProvider/defaults.description: Specify new default prop values for components. Keep in mind that this will be merged with previously defined values.

VDialog/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VDialog/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VDialog/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VDialog/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

VDialog/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VDialog/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VDialog/location.description: Specifies the anchor point for positioning the component, using directional cues to align it either horizontally, vertically, or both..

VDialog/absolute.description: Applies **position: absolute** to the content element.

VDialog/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VDialog/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VDialog/transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

VDialog/retain-focus.description: Tab focus will return to the first child of the dialog by default. Disable this when using external tools that require focus such as TinyMCE or vue-clipboard.

VDialog/scrollable.description: When set to true, expects a `v-card` and a `v-card-text` component with a designated height. For more information, check out the [scrollable example](/components/dialogs#scrollable).

VDialog/close-on-back.description: Closes the overlay content when the browser's back button is pressed or `$router.back()` is called, cancelling the original navigation. `persistent` overlays will cancel navigation and animate as if they were clicked outside instead of closing.

VDialog/contained.description: Limits the size of the component and scrim to its offset parent. Implies `absolute` and `attach`. (Note: The parent element must have position: relative.).

VDialog/content-class.description: Applies a custom class to the detached element. This is useful because the content is moved to the beginning of the `v-app` component (unless the **attach** prop is provided) and is not targetable by classes passed directly on the component.

VDialog/content-props.description: Apply custom properties to the content.

VDialog/opacity.description: Sets the opacity of the scrim element. Only applies if `scrim` is enabled.

VDialog/no-click-animation.description: Disables the bounce effect when clicking outside of a `v-dialog`'s content when using the **persistent** prop.

VDialog/persistent.description: Clicking outside of the element or pressing **esc** key will not deactivate it.

VDialog/scrim.description: Accepts true/false to enable background, and string to define color.

VDialog/z-index.description: The z-index used for the component.

VDialog/target.description: For locationStrategy="connected", specify an element or array of x,y coordinates that the overlay should position itself relative to. This will be the activator element by default.

VDialog/activator-props.description: Apply custom properties to the activator.

VDialog/open-on-click.description: Activate the component when the activator is clicked.

VDialog/open-on-hover.description: Designates whether component should activate when its activator is hovered.

VDialog/open-on-focus.description: Activate the component when the activator is focused.

VDialog/close-on-content-click.description: Closes component when you click on its content.

VDialog/close-delay.description: Milliseconds to wait before closing component. Only applies to hover and focus events.

VDialog/open-delay.description: Milliseconds to wait before opening component. Only applies to hover and focus events.

VDialog/eager.description: Forces the component's content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.

VDialog/location-strategy.description: A function used to specifies how the component should position relative to its activator.

VDialog/origin.description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation [for transition origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin).

VDialog/offset.description: Increases distance from the target. When passed as a pair of numbers, the second value shifts anchor along the side and away from the target.

VDialog/scroll-strategy.description: Strategy used when the component is activate and user scrolls.

VDialog/attach.description: Specifies which DOM element the overlay content should teleport to. Can be a direct element reference, querySelector string, or `true` to disable teleporting. Uses `body` by default.

VDialogBottomTransition/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VDialogBottomTransition/mode.description: Sets the transition mode (does not apply to transition-group). You can find more information on the Vue documentation [for transition modes](https://vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transition).

VDialogBottomTransition/group.description: Creates a `transition-group` component. You can find more information in the [vue docs](https://vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transitiongroup).

VDialogBottomTransition/origin.description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation [for transition origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin).

VDialogBottomTransition/hide-on-leave.description: Hides the leaving element (no exit animation).

VDialogBottomTransition/leave-absolute.description: Absolutely positions the leaving element (useful for [FLIP](https://aerotwist.com/blog/flip-your-animations/)).

VDialogTopTransition/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VDialogTopTransition/mode.description: Sets the transition mode (does not apply to transition-group). You can find more information on the Vue documentation [for transition modes](https://vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transition).

VDialogTopTransition/group.description: Creates a `transition-group` component. You can find more information in the [vue docs](https://vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transitiongroup).

VDialogTopTransition/origin.description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation [for transition origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin).

VDialogTopTransition/hide-on-leave.description: Hides the leaving element (no exit animation).

VDialogTopTransition/leave-absolute.description: Absolutely positions the leaving element (useful for [FLIP](https://aerotwist.com/blog/flip-your-animations/)).

VDialogTransition/target.description: Sets the target element for the transition.

VDivider/length.description: Sets the dividers length. Default unit is px.

VDivider/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VDivider/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VDivider/inset.description: Adds indentation (72px) for **normal** dividers, reduces max height for **vertical**.

VDivider/thickness.description: Sets the dividers thickness. Default unit is px.

VEmptyState/title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VEmptyState/href.description: The URL the action button links to.

VEmptyState/to.description: The URL the action button links to.

VEmptyState/headline.description: A large headline often used for 404 pages.

VEmptyState/action-text.description: The text used for the action button.

VEmptyState/justify.description: Control the justification of the text.

VEmptyState/text-width.description: Sets the width of the text container.

VExpansionPanel/static.description: Remove title size expansion when selected.

VExpansionPanels/mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).

VExpansionPanels/hide-actions.description: Hide the expand icon in the content title.

VExpansionPanels/expand-icon.description: Icon used when the expansion panel is in a expandable state.

VExpansionPanels/collapse-icon.description: Icon used when the expansion panel is in a collapsable state.

VFab/symbol.description: The [Symbol](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Symbol) used to hook into group functionality for components like [v-btn-toggle](/components/btn-toggle) and [v-bottom-navigation](/components/bottom-navigations/).

VFab/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

VFab/flat.description: Removes the button box shadow. This is different than using the 'flat' variant.

VFab/replace.description: Setting **replace** prop will call `router.replace()` instead of `router.push()` when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record. You can find more information about the [replace](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#replace) prop on the vue-router documentation.

VFab/border.description: Applies utility border classes to the component. To use it, you need to omit the `border-` prefix, (for example use `border-sm` as `border="sm"`).  Find a list of the built-in border classes on the [borders page](/styles/borders).

VFab/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component. The button will become _round_.

VFab/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VFab/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

VFab/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VFab/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

VFab/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VFab/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

VFab/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VFab/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VFab/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

VFab/location.description: The location of the fab relative to the layout. Only works when using **app**.

VFab/position.description: Sets the position for the component.

VFab/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. This can be **0**, **xs**, **sm**, true, **lg**, **xl**, **pill**, **circle**, and **shaped**. Find more information on available border radius classes on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

VFab/tile.description: Removes any applied **border-radius** from the component.

VFab/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

VFab/name.description: Assign a specific name for layout registration.

VFab/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VFab/size.description: Sets the height and width of the component. Default unit is px. Can also use the following predefined sizes: **x-small**, **small**, **default**, **large**, and **x-large**.

VFab/value.description: The value used when the component is selected in a group. If not provided, a unique ID will be used.

VFab/extended.description: An alternate style for the FAB that expects text.

VFab/order.description: Adjust the order of the component in relation to its registration order.

VFab/transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

VFab/stacked.description: Displays the button as a flex-column.

VFab/base-color.description: Sets the color of component when not focused.

VFab/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

VFab/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

VFab/offset.description: Translates the Fab up or down, depending on if location is set to **top** or **bottom**.

VFab/block.description: Expands the button to 100% of available space.

VFab/active-color.description: The applied color when the component is in an active state.

VFab/href.description: Designates the component as anchor and applies the **href** attribute.

VFab/to.description: Denotes the target route of the link. You can find more information about the [**to** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#to) on the vue-router documentation.

VFab/exact.description: Exactly match the link. Without this, '/' will match every route. You can find more information about the [**exact** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#exact) on the vue-router documentation.

VFab/prepend-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

VFab/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

VFab/readonly.description: Puts the button in a readonly state. Cannot be clicked or navigated to by keyboard.

VFab/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

VFab/app.description: If true, attaches to the closest layout and positions according to the value of **location**.

VFab/appear.description: Used to control the animation of the FAB.

VFab/layout.description: If true, will effect layout dimensions based on size and position.

VFabTransition/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VFabTransition/mode.description: Sets the transition mode (does not apply to transition-group). You can find more information on the Vue documentation [for transition modes](https://vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transition).

VFabTransition/group.description: Creates a `transition-group` component. You can find more information in the [vue docs](https://vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transitiongroup).

VFabTransition/origin.description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation [for transition origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin).

VFabTransition/hide-on-leave.description: Hides the leaving element (no exit animation).

VFabTransition/leave-absolute.description: Absolutely positions the leaving element (useful for [FLIP](https://aerotwist.com/blog/flip-your-animations/)).

VFadeTransition/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VFadeTransition/mode.description: Sets the transition mode (does not apply to transition-group). You can find more information on the Vue documentation [for transition modes](https://vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transition).

VFadeTransition/group.description: Creates a `transition-group` component. You can find more information in the [vue docs](https://vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transitiongroup).

VFadeTransition/origin.description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation [for transition origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin).

VField/flat.description: Removes box shadow when using a variant with elevation.

VField/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VField/error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.

VField/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. This can be **0**, **xs**, **sm**, true, **lg**, **xl**, **pill**, **circle**, and **shaped**. Find more information on available border radius classes on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

VField/tile.description: Removes any applied **border-radius** from the component.

VField/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VField/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VField/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

VField/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the input.

VField/id.description: Sets the DOM id on the component.

VField/label.description: Sets the text of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.

VField/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VField/base-color.description: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.

VField/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

VField/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

VField/center-affix.description: Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center.

VField/glow.description: Makes prepend/append icons full opacity when the field is focused and apply color.

VField/icon-color.description: Sets the color of the prepend/append icons.

VField/focused.description: Forces a focused state styling on the component.

VField/append-inner-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **append-inner** slot.

VField/clearable.description: Allows for the component to be cleared.

VField/clear-icon.description: The icon used when the **clearable** prop is set to true.

VField/dirty.description: Manually apply the dirty state styling.

VField/persistent-clear.description: Always show the clearable icon when the input is dirty (By default it only shows on hover).

VField/prepend-inner-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend-inner** slot.

VField/single-line.description: Label does not move on focus/dirty.

VFieldLabel/floating.description: Elevates the label above the slotted content.

VFileInput/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

VFileInput/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

VFileInput/center-affix.description: Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center.

VFileInput/glow.description: Makes prepend/append icons full opacity when the field is focused and apply color.

VFileInput/icon-color.description: Sets the color of the prepend/append icons.

VFileInput/messages.description: Displays a list of messages or a single message if using a string.

VFileInput/error-messages.description: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation.

VFileInput/max-errors.description: Control the maximum number of shown errors from validation.

VFileInput/rules.description: Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`.

VImg/content-class.description: Apply a custom class to the internal content element.

VImg/options.description: Options that are passed to the [Intersection observer](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Intersection_Observer_API) constructor.

VImg/cover.description: Resizes the background image to cover the entire container.

VImg/gradient.description: The gradient to apply to the image. Only supports [linear-gradient](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/gradient/linear-gradient) syntax, anything else should be done with classes.

VImg/lazy-src.description:
Something to show while waiting for the main image to load, typically a small base64-encoded thumbnail. Has a slight blur filter applied.  
NOTE: This prop has no effect unless either `height` or `aspect-ratio` are provided.

VImg/srcset.description: A set of alternate images to use based on device size. [Read more...](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#attr-srcset).

VImg/aspect-ratio.description: Calculated as `width/height`, so for a 1920x1080px image this will be `1.7778`. Will be calculated automatically if omitted.

VImg/inline.description: Display as an inline element instead of a block, also disables flex-grow.

VImg/crossorigin.description: Specify that images should be fetched with CORS enabled [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#crossorigin)

VImg/referrerpolicy.description: Define which referrer is sent when fetching the resource [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#referrerpolicy)

VInfiniteScroll/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VInfiniteScroll/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

VInfiniteScroll/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VInfiniteScroll/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

VInfiniteScroll/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VInfiniteScroll/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VInfiniteScroll/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VInfiniteScroll/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VInfiniteScroll/mode.description: Specifies if content should load automatically when scrolling (**intersect**) or manually (**manual**).

VInfiniteScroll/side.description: Specifies the side where new content should appear. Either the **start**, **end**, or **both** sides.

VInfiniteScroll/margin.description: Value sent to the intersection observer. Will make the observer trigger earlier, by the margin (px) value supplied.

VInfiniteScroll/load-more-text.description: Text shown in default load more button, when in manual mode.

VInfiniteScroll/empty-text.description: Text shown when there is no more content to load.

VInput/error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.

VInput/label.description: Sets the text of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.

VInput/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VInput/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VInput/id.description: Sets the DOM id on the component.

VInput/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VInput/base-color.description: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.

VInput/prepend-icon.description: Prepends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`.

VInput/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

VInput/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

VInput/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VInput/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VInput/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VInput/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

VInput/center-affix.description: Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center.

VInput/glow.description: Makes prepend/append icons full opacity when the input is focused and apply color.

VInput/icon-color.description: Sets the color of the prepend/append icons.

VInput/hide-spin-buttons.description: Hides spin buttons on the input when type is set to `number`.

VInput/hint.description: Displays hint text below the input when focused. Force this always open with the [persistent-hint](#props-persistent-hint) property.

VInput/messages.description: Displays a list of messages or a single message if using a string.

VInput/direction.description: Changes the direction of the input.

VInput/error-messages.description: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation.

VInput/max-errors.description: Control the maximum number of shown errors from validation.

VInput/rules.description: Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`.

VInput/validate-on.type:
| 'eager'
  | 'lazy'
  | 'blur'
  | 'input'
  | 'submit'
  | 'invalid-input'
  | 'blur lazy'
  | 'input lazy'
  | 'submit lazy'

VInput/validate-on.description: Change what type of event triggers validation to run.

VInput/validation-value.description: The value used when applying validation rules.

VInput/focused.description: Forces a focused state styling on the component.

VInput/hide-details.description: Hides hint and validation errors. When set to `auto` messages will be rendered only if there's a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display.

VItemGroup/mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).

VLayoutItem/order.description: Adjust the order of the component in relation to its registration order.

VList/nav.description: An alternative styling that reduces `v-list-item` width and rounds the corners. Typically used with **[v-navigation-drawer](/components/navigation-drawers)**.

VList/activated.description: Array of ids of activated nodes.

VList/disabled.description: Puts all children inputs into a disabled state.

VList/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VList/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VList/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VList/items.description: Can be an array of objects or strings. By default objects should have a **title** property, and can optionally have a **props** property containing any [VListItem props](/api/v-list-item/#props), a **value** property to allow selection, and a **children** property containing more item objects. Keys to use for these can be changed with the **item-title**, **item-value**, **item-props**, and **item-children** props.

VList/active-color.description: The applied color when the component is in an active state.

VList/base-color.description: Sets the color of component when not focused.

VList/slim.description: Reduces horizontal spacing for badges, icons, tooltips, and avatars within slim list items to create a more compact visual representation.

VList/border.description: Applies utility border classes to the component. To use it, you need to omit the `border-` prefix, (for example use `border-sm` as `border="sm"`).  Find a list of the built-in border classes on the [borders page](/styles/borders).

VList/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

VList/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

VList/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

VList/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

VList/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

VList/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

VList/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. This can be **0**, **xs**, **sm**, true, **lg**, **xl**, **pill**, **circle**, and **shaped**. Find more information on available border radius classes on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

VList/tile.description: Removes any applied **border-radius** from the component.

VList/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VList/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

VList/active-class.description: The class applied to the component when it is in an active state.

VList/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

VList/expand-icon.description: Icon to display when the list item is collapsed.

VList/collapse-icon.description: Icon to display when the list item is expanded.

VList/lines.description: Designates a **minimum-height** for all children `v-list-item` components. This prop uses [line-clamp](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-line-clamp) and is not supported in all browsers.

VList/activatable.description: Designates whether the list items are activatable.

VList/selectable.description: Designates whether the list items are selectable.

VList/opened.description: An array containing the values of currently opened groups. Can be two-way bound with `v-model:opened`.

VList/selected.description: An array containing the values of currently selected items. Can be two-way bound with `v-model:selected`.

VList/mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).

VList/active-strategy.description:
Affects how items with children behave when activated.
- **leaf:** Only leaf nodes (items without children) can be activated.
- **independent:** All nodes can be activated whether they have children or not.
- **classic:** Activating a parent node will cause all children to be activated.

VList/select-strategy.description:
Affects how items with children behave when selected.
- **leaf:** Only leaf nodes (items without children) can be selected.
- **independent:** All nodes can be selected whether they have children or not.
- **classic:** Selecting a parent node will cause all children to be selected, parent nodes will be displayed as selected if all their descendants are selected. Only leaf nodes will be added to the model.
- **trunk**: Same as classic but if all of a node's children are selected then only that node will be added to the model.

VList/open-strategy.description:
Affects how items with children behave when expanded.
- **multiple:** Any number of groups can be open at once.
- **single:** Only one group at each level can be open, opening a group will cause others to close.
- **list:** Multiple, but all other groups will close when an item is selected.

VList/item-type.description: Designates the key on the supplied items that is used for determining the nodes type.

VList/item-title.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its title.

VList/item-value.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its value.

VList/item-children.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its children.

VList/item-props.description: Props object that will be applied to each item component. `true` will treat the original object as raw props and pass it directly to the component.

VList/return-object.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with **item-value**.

VList/value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare **model-value** and values contains in the **items** prop.

VListGroup/expand-icon.description: Icon to display when the list item is collapsed.

VListGroup/collapse-icon.description: Icon to display when the list item is expanded.

VListGroup/fluid.description: Removes the left padding assigned for action icons from group items.

VListGroup/subgroup.description: Designate the component as nested list group.

VListImg/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VListItem/replace.description: Setting **replace** prop will call `router.replace()` instead of `router.push()` when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record. You can find more information about the [replace](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#replace) prop on the vue-router documentation.

VListItem/link.description: Designates that the component is a link. This is automatic when using the href or to prop.

VListItem/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

VListItem/nav.description: Reduces the width v-list-item takes up as well as adding a border radius.

VListItem/title.description: Generates a `v-list-item-title` component with the supplied value. Note that this overrides the native [`title`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/title) attribute, that must be set with `v-bind:title.attr` instead.

VListItem/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

VListItem/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

VListItem/value.description: The value used for selection. Obtained from [`v-list`](/api/v-list)'s `v-model:selected` when the item is selected.

VListItem/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

VListItem/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

VListItem/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

VListItem/active-color.description: The applied color when the component is in an active state.

VListItem/base-color.description: Sets the color of component when not focused.

VListItem/prepend-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

VListItem/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

VListItem/slim.description: Reduces horizontal spacing for badges, icons, tooltips, and avatars to create a more compact visual representation.

VListItem/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. This can be **0**, **xs**, **sm**, true, **lg**, **xl**, **pill**, **circle**, and **shaped**. Find more information on available border radius classes on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

VListItem/tile.description: Removes any applied **border-radius** from the component.

VListItem/href.description: Designates the component as anchor and applies the **href** attribute.

VListItem/exact.description: Exactly match the link. Without this, '/' will match every route. You can find more information about the [**exact** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#exact) on the vue-router documentation.

VListItem/to.description: Denotes the target route of the link. You can find more information about the [**to** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#to) on the vue-router documentation.

VListItem/color.description: Applies specified color to the control when in an **active** state or **input-value** is **true** - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors),

VListItem/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

VListItem/subtitle.description: Specify a subtitle text for the component.

VListItem/active-class.description: The class applied to the component when it matches the current route. Find more information about the [active-class prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#active-class) on the [vue-router](https://router.vuejs.org/) documentation.

VListItem/lines.description: The line declaration specifies the minimum height of the item and can also be controlled from v-list with the same prop.

VListItem/append-avatar.description: Appends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

VListItem/prepend-avatar.description: Prepends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

VListItemAction/end.description: Applies margin at the start of the component.

VListItemAction/start.description: Applies margin at the end of the component.

VListItemMedia/end.description: Applies margin at the start of the component.

VListItemMedia/start.description: Applies margin at the end of the component.
